main.name: Nathan Breen
main.description: Software Engineer, UI & UX Designer, Ambulator
main.bio: Software Engineering, Graphic Design, Front-end UI & UX Design, Back-end, React.js, Object Oriented Programming, Ambulator.

education.school: The University of Texas at Dallas
education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science - The University of Texas at Dallas (UTD)
education.description: Algorithm & Data Structure design, software engineering principles and methodologies, Front-End & Back-End implementations, Object Oriented Programming(OOP)...

work.title: IT Support Technician
work.description: Provided technical support associated with troubleshooting, diagnosing, and implementing technological solutions pertaining to software or hardware related matters in office.

work.title: Front-end Development Intern (React.js, Gatsby, Bootstrap, Ant Design, TailwindCSS)
work.description: Developed a full-stack application with coordination between a front and back-end team that enabled users to upload .csv and .xlsx product catalog files to be parsed, uploaded, and processed to a back-end database containing online e-commerce product data via a RESTful API.

software.title: React Pokedex: Pokemon API
software.desc: Retro-minimalist style and fully responsive Pokedex interface using the PokeAPI (RESTful), React, and styling CSS from scratch.

software.title: Unthink AI E-Commerce Product Uploader(Front-end Team)
software.desc: Developed the front-end user interface with coordination of back-end team, enabling users to upload .csv and .xlsx product catalog files to be parsed, uploaded, and processed to a back-end database containing online e-commerce product data via a Django implemented RESTful API.

software.title: Ambulation Zone
software.desc: A zone for my thoughts, programming related, or just for fun ideas (usually visual/interactive).  Sort of a mix of everything.  This is best experienced on a PC/Desktop.

software.title: Greed Island Cards Database: Full-Stack Project
software.desc: A full-stack web project with fully implemented multi-pathway RESTful API and Database linkage, populated with the information for all of the Greed Island cards from the popular show Hunter X Hunter.  Accompanied by a front-end user display to view and search through this array of cards.

software.title: Curated and Animated Album Covers
software.desc: A few of my favorite album covers brought to life utilizing CSS styling and animations.

software.title: A Simple ToDo List Applet
software.desc: The standard ToDo list project built in React, it's that simple.

software.title: Pho-Ballah Restaurant Concept Landing Page
software.desc: A concept restaurant landing page for a fine-dining Pho restaurant.

software.title: ProgrammerCalculator: A Windows Programming Calculator Remake
software.desc: University Project: A complete recreation of the Windows Programmer Caculator implementing an Infix/Postfix expression reducing and solving algorithm.
